column1: Little Goat Diner////Absolutely amazing experience in all.  Had the crab dip to start
column3: best I've ever had.  Then the Reuben
column4: which basically melted apart while eating it
column5: incredible.  The atmosphere was perfect for the diner setting
column6: and the portion size was well within control and away from the normal insane American standards.  Tried the Cookie Pie for dessert
column7: creative and tasty!  Can't recommend this place enough
